feature_whiteboard_desc: Built-in whiteboard with drawing tools and course playback for easy review.
feature_multilingual_desc: Supports Traditional Chinese / English, with plans to expand more languages for international teaching.
feature_payment_desc: Planning to integrate Stripe + local payment methods to support safe payments from students worldwide.
confirm_delete_course: Are you sure you want to delete this course (demo data)?
low_latency_desc: Enabling this reduces latency but may affect stability. Suitable for 1-on-1 teaching scenarios.
prompt_start_date: Enter new start date (YYYY-MM-DD), leave blank to remove
prompt_membership_plan: Enter membership plan key (e.g., basic/pro/elite), leave blank to remove
confirm_action: Are you sure you want to
order_complete_only_paid: Order can only be completed when in PAID status
complete_only_paid: Can only complete in PAID status
page_not_found_message: The page you are looking for does not exist.
plan_viewer_feature1: Browse and search teacher and course listings
plan_viewer_feature2: Cannot book or participate in paid courses
plan_basic_feature3: No built-in whiteboard (use paper or screenshots)
plan_basic_feature4: Basic app features: schedule, notifications, simple reviews
plan_premium_feature5: Advanced app features: detailed analytics, progress tracking
plan_pro_target: For students who attend classes weekly and value whiteboard and recording
plan_pro_feature1: High quality video (720p/1080p depending on implementation)
plan_pro_feature2: Built-in online whiteboard for drawing, writing problems, highlighting
plan_pro_feature5: More teacher options, filter by expertise, ratings, hourly rates
plan_elite_price_hint: High value, contract or project-based pricing
plan_elite_target: For international schools, tutoring systems, or VIP parents willing to invest
plan_elite_feature2: Parallel streaming support: small group classes + parent observation
plan_elite_feature3: Full recording, cloud retention 180-365 days, downloadable
plan_elite_feature4: Premium teachers: experienced, top school background, bilingual/full English
plan_elite_feature5: Dedicated customer service and learning reports: attendance, hours, topic stats
pricing_description: According to different learning depths and needs, the tutoring platform is divided into Basic / Pro / Elite three plans, with core differences in video quality, whiteboard and recording playback, as well as teacher and service levels.
pricing_price_note: (Actual prices can be fine-tuned before launch)
testimony_description: Hear from students around the world sharing their learning journeys and growth stories at Tutor Corner.
testimony_cta_title: Ready to start your learning journey?
testimony_cta_description: Join thousands of successful students and begin your new language learning chapter.
testimony_student1_content: Learning English here is really fun! The teacher is very patient, and the materials are rich. My speaking ability has improved significantly in just three months.
testimony_student2_content: The small group teaching gives me lots of practice opportunities. The real-time whiteboard function is very powerful, the teacher can correct my stroke order and pronunciation anytime.
testimony_student3_content: The course time is very flexible, suitable for busy office workers. The recording playback function allows me to review anytime after work, really convenient.
about_intro: Welcome to Tutor Corner. Our mission is to provide high-quality one-on-one and small group teaching, combined with real-time whiteboard, recording playback, and professional teachers to help students achieve their learning goals.
about_feature1: Carefully selected teachers with complete review and course design support
about_feature2: Real-time whiteboard and recording playback for easy review
about_feature3: Flexible course schedules and multi-language support
about_contact: If you have any questions, please contact us via email: support@tutorcorner.example
calendar_description: View your scheduled course sessions and set email reminders.
